sentences.sContent: We discovered the floor of the byre when we excavated so effectively we had put back what was originally there.
sentences.sContent_eng: We discovered the floor of the byre when we excavated so effectively we had put back what was originally there.
sentences.sCn: 原来别墅边上有一个牛棚，我们挖掘的时候发现了牛棚的地板，所以我们恢复了别墅原来的模样。

trans.tranOther: a farm building in which cattle are kept
